weekly picks (May 1 week 2022)

Posted on May 1, 2022 in 2022may 

A WordCloud of 2022 May 1st week collection

  1. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.02198 Thermal Transport in 2D Nematic Superconductors (nematic, arXiv.org)

  2. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.00239 $\textit{Ab initio}$ Materials Design of Superconductivity in $d^9$ Nickelates (Arita, arXiv.org)

  3. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevX.12.021029 Chiral Spin Liquid Ground State in ${\mathrm{YBaCo}}{3}{\mathrm{FeO}}{7}$ (chiral spin liquid, PRX)

  4. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.187201 Imaging Topological Defects in a Noncollinear Antiferromagnet (PRL)

  5. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.186802 Topological Space-Time Crystal (PRL)

  6. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.174506 Quenched randomness, thermal fluctuations, and reentrant superconductivity: Application to ${\mathrm{UTe}}_{2}$ (SRaghu, PRB)

  7. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L201102 Doping a moir\‘e Mott insulator: A $t\ensuremath{-}J$ model study of twisted cuprates (Vishwanath, PRB)

  8. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.195102 Nonlinear optical response of type-II Weyl fermions in two dimensions (PRB)

  9. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.184504 Superconductivity and quantum oscillations in single crystals of the compensated semimetal ${\mathrm{CaSb}}_{2}$ (PRB)

  10. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.184405 Effect of interlayer Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction on spin structure in synthetic antiferromagnetic multilayers (PRB)

  11. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.184301 Effect of low-frequency optical phonons on the thermal conductivity of $2H$ molybdenum disulfide (phonon, PRB)

  12. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.00239 $\textit{Ab initio}$ Materials Design of Superconductivity in $d^9$ Nickelates (nickelate, arXiv.org)

  13. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.00899 Strange metal dynamics across the phase diagram of Bi${2}$Sr${2}$CuO$_{6+\delta}$ cuprates (arXiv.org)

  14. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.00790 Frustration shapes multi-channel Kondo physics: a star graph perspective (Frustration, arXiv.org)

  15. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.00599 Enhanced Seebeck coefficient through the magnetic fluctuations in Sr$2$Ru${1-x}M_x$O$_4$ ($M = $ Co, Mn) (arXiv.org)

  16. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.00066 Disorder effects on hot spots in electron-doped cuprates (magnetic fluctuation tremblay, arXiv.org)

  17. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.00349 Twisted bilayers of thin film magnetic topological insulators (arXiv.org)

  18. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.186801 Edge Reconstruction of a Time-Reversal Invariant Insulator: Compressible-Incompressible Stripes (QHE compressible-Incomp, PRL)

  19. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.184404 Polar magneto-optical Kerr effect in antiferromagnetic ${M}_{2}\mathrm{As} (M=\mathrm{Cr},\mathrm{Mn},\mathrm{Fe})$ under an external magnetic field (PRB)

  20. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.184402 Structural transition of skyrmion quasiparticles under compression (PRB)

  21. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.184403 Thermal generation of droplet soliton in chiral magnet (PRB)

  22. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.174504 Phonon-induced rotation of the electronic nematic director in superconducting ${\mathrm{Bi}}{2}{\mathrm{Se}}{3}$ (PRB)

  23. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.195404 Anomalous screening in narrow-gap carbon nanotubes (Nanotube, PRB)

  24. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.205405 Valley-driven Zitterbewegung in Kekul\‘e-distorted graphene (PRB)

  25. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.174401 Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya induced spin-transfer torques in kagome antiferromagnets (PRB)

  26. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.184501 Majorana flat bands at structured surfaces of nodal noncentrosymmetric superconductors (majorana flatband, PRB)

  27. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.184502 Two-dimensional attractive Hubbard model and the BCS-BEC crossover (PRB)

  28. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L201201 Spin-valley Silin modes in graphene with substrate-induced spin-orbit coupling (PRB)

  29. https://physics.aps.org/articles/v15/65 Two Spins Take the Quantum Bus (Physics)

  30. https://arxiv.org/abs/2204.14209v1 Site-specific electronic and magnetic excitations of the skyrmion material Cu$_2$OSeO$_3$ (arxiv.org)

  31. https://arxiv.org/abs/2204.14164v1 Physical properties of MnSi at extreme doping with Co: Quantum criticality (arxiv.org)

  32. https://arxiv.org/abs/2204.13748v1 Intermediate Valence State in $\mathrm{YbB_4}$ Revealed by Resonant X-ray Emission Spectroscopy (arxiv.org)
